title: UPDATE 4-6 Nations summaries
text: February 5, 2018 / 12:59 PM / Updated 7 hours ago UPDATE 4-6 Nations summaries Reuters Staff 2 Min Read Feb 5 (OPTA) - summaries from the 6 Nations matches on Saturday Wales (8) 22 Tries: North (19,43), Roberts (77) Conversions: Halfpenny (45,78) Penalties: Halfpenny (38) Ireland (6) 9 Penalties: Sexton (6,56), Jackson (26) Yellow cards: Sexton (37) Referee: Wayne Barnes Italy (11) 18 Tries: Parisse (2), Esposito (80) Conversions: Canna (81) Penalties: Canna (16,27) France (16) 40 Tries: Fickou (20), Vakatawa (47), Picamoles (66), Dulin (76) Conversions: Lopez (21,48,67,77) Penalties: Lopez (8,18,33,42) Referee: Ben O'keeffe England (16:00) Scotland Ground: Twickenham
